title: Mini-Ep 134: Acid Trip
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 134: Acid Trip
itunes:subtitle: Kate gets deeper into the orthopedic shoe game while Doree realizes she might have some doomsday prepping tendencies. Then, listeners reach out about salicylic acid cleansers, feeling anxious about a text convo with a close friend, and where to find ed...
description:
Kate gets deeper into the orthopedic shoe game while Doree realizes she might have some doomsday prepping tendencies. Then, listeners reach out about salicylic acid cleansers, feeling anxious about a text convo with a close friend, and where to find edible skincare products. Plus, Kate and Doree answer another “Pod Sausage” question!


We’re breaking down the best cleansers and want to know your favorite. Tell us here!


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. (And yes, we want your long distance dedications!)


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • SIGNATURE HARDWARE - Real-life isn’t always perfect, but with Signature Hardware it is beautiful. Visit signaturehardware.com/FOREVER35 to find your style today.
  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
  • OXICLEAN - To Work your Magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/TRYME and order a free sample.
  • RITUAL - For 10% off during your first three months visit ritual.com/FOREVER35. 
  • BEST FIENDS - Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play. That’s FRIENDS without the R – Best Fiends.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
